item.description:
Huge house party with socializing, dancing, games, food and drinks!

One of our members, Joan is allowing us the pleasure to using her lovely private home (5000 SQ foot mansion) in Danvers, MA (NOTE: I’ll send out the address 2 days before the event) for our last fun house party at her place since Joan has sold her home.

I bringing red + white wines, beer, water, soda, Ice tea, etc and order Chinese food locally, like Lo-mein, Pork fried Rice, Chicken Fingers , Chicken Teriyaki, boneless spare ribs, beef n broccoli etc. To cover this cost I’m collecting $20 from all members and guests who attend this event.

I’ll get the plates, napkins, forks, knives, spoons, trash bags too so we don’t drive Joan crazy. I’ll bring a cooler Ice etc too. I know Joan has some coolers but if anyone wants to bring a few more cooler with ice would be cool too.

We’ll need help setting up the drinks and cleaning up at the end too so I am looking for 6 volunteers: 3 for setup of drink and washing glasses and 3 for breakdown/ cleanup/ washing glasses/packing away.

I’ll bring Games: Catchphrase, Apples to Apples and Pictionary with my large White board and easel for this.

There will be 50 to 60 members attending and we want to be as welcoming a guest as possible! Joan has a beautiful home and I want to make sure we leave it as beautiful as when we arrive.

Parking:Please when you pull in there is parking on the left and right, you can park in front of the garage on the right and the huge barn on the left and block people in.  You can also park on the street, but please do not block the neighbors driveways.

Joan has a fire pit we can use and if someone has any wood to bring that would be great.   There are 2 large family room and a 700 SQ foot dancing area upstairs

Please print out detailed directions too so we don’t bother Joan too much. Also, it is best if people can try to carpool and pick up T bound members as well and we plan to end around 10:30PM so we can clean out and be gone by 11PM at the latest.

Looking forward to seeing everyone there for an interesting night of fun!

Thanks Biagio
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be inside so please come in and say hi to Biagio and Joan
item.name: Amazing house party with socializing, dancing, games, food and drinks!
